login_code.subject: Your Authentication Code: ###CODE###
login_code.message:
Hello,

Your authentication code is: ###CODE###

This code is valid for 15 minutes.

###LINK_BLOCK###

If you did not request this code, please ignore this email.

Best regards,
Authentication Service
login_code.link_block:
Alternatively, you can click this link to authenticate automatically:
https://your-app.example.com/validate?session=###SESSION_ID###&code=###CODE###
